response:
"wie kann man noch immer von datenprivatsphäre sprechen, wenn unser staat sich weigert, strenge datenschutzgesetze zu verabschieden? es ist skandalös, dass wir als bürger nicht das recht haben, unsere persönlichen informationen zu schützen. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #rechtedesbürgers"

translation: "how can we still talk about data privacy when our government refuses to pass strict data protection laws? it's outrageous that we as citizens don't have the right to protect our personal information. #dataprotection #privacy #citizensrights"

this post expresses frustration and disappointment towards the government's lack of action in protecting citizens' personal data. by using hashtags, it also shows solidarity with the larger movement advocating for stronger data protection laws. the use of german language and twitter-style formatting adds to the authenticity of the post as a social media commentary.
